text: Nobusuke Kishi was a Japanese politician. He was Prime Minister of Japan two times. Kishi was the grandfather of former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe and the current Japanese Minister of Defense Nobuo Kishi, and the father-in- law of former Japanese Foreign Minister Shintaro Abe. ==References== Category:1896 births Category:1987 deaths Category:Anti-communists Category:Prime ministers of Japan Category:World War II people Category:University of Tokyo alumni Category:Shinzo Abe Category:Politicians from Yamaguchi Prefecture Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians
title: Nobusuke Kishi
